shouldShowAddNewAccountOnHistoryPage.description: Whether to show Add New Linked Account Modal on the Linked Account History page

shouldDisableLinkedAccountWhenNoticeOfCh.description: Whether to enable ability to disable a linked account in the Admin tool

searchByUuidEnabled.description: Whether linked accounts should be retrieved by UUID instead of account number

enabled.description: Whether linked accounts feature is enabled

minVersion.description: Minimum version required for linked accounts feature

deleteAccountEnabled.description: Whether deleting linked accounts is enabled

intraBankEnabled.description: Whether intra-bank linked accounts are enabled

crossBankEnabled.description: Whether cross-bank linked accounts are enabled

showDeletedAccountsEnabled.description: Whether to show deleted linked accounts

showCfsAccounts.description: Whether to show CFS linked accounts

showAchAccounts.description: Whether to show ACH linked accounts

accountMaskingCharacter.description: Character used for masking account numbers
